              </value>
            <value from="01" to="7f" unit="sec">
                <description>Seconds</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
      </configParams>
  
    
    <alarmMappings>
        <alarmMapping alarmEventV2="01" alarmLevelV1="01" alarmTypeV1="02" alarmTypeV2="08"/>
        <alarmMapping alarmEventV2="ff" alarmLevelV1="ff" alarmTypeV1="01" alarmTypeV2="08"/>
        <alarmMapping alarmEventV2="03" alarmLevelV1="11" alarmTypeV1="01" alarmTypeV2="07"/>
      </alarmMappings>
  
    <resourceLinks>
     
    <deviceImage url="http://www.pepper1.net/zwavedb/uploads/resources/67c7232867ce1ce1221d56d5921ac599ec649f44.jpg"/>
          </resourceLinks>
    
  </ZWaveDevice>

ZDDXML.name: ZDDXML
ZDDXML.value:
<ZWaveDevice schemaVersion="2" xmlns="http://www.pepper1.net/zwavedb/xml-schemata/z-wave">

  <descriptorVersion>1</descriptorVersion>

  <deviceData>
            <manufacturerId value="0115"/>
        <productType value="1000"/>
    <productId value="0001"/>
    <libType value="06"/>
    <protoVersion value="03"/>
    <protoSubVersion value="16"/>
    <appVersion value="01"/>
    <appSubVersion value="06"/>
        <basicClass value="04"/>
            <genericClass value="10"/>
            <specificClass value="01"/>
        <optional value="true"/>
    <listening value="true"/>
    <routing value="true"/>
        <beamSensor>0</beamSensor>
            <rfFrequency>EU</rfFrequency>
                
      </deviceData>

  <deviceDescription>
                <description>
            <lang xml:lang="de">Wandschalter</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">One paddle wall switch</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="ru">Радиореле с одной парой кнопок</lang>
          </description>
            <wakeupNote>
            <lang xml:lang="de"/>
            <lang xml:lang="en"/>
            <lang xml:lang="ru"/>
          </wakeupNote>
            <inclusionNote>
            <lang xml:lang="de">Dreifach auf Schaltfläche</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Button triple press</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="ru">Тройное нажатие на одну из кнопок</lang>
          </inclusionNote>
            <productName>Flush-Mountable Switch v1.6</productName>
            <brandName>Z-Wave.Me</brandName>
            <productLine>Düwi modification</productLine>
            <productCode>054313Z</productCode>
                        </deviceDescription>

    <commandClasses>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0020"/>
        <commandClass id="0025"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0026" inNIF="false"/>
        <commandClass id="0086"/>
        <commandClass id="0087"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0027"/>
        <commandClass id="008e" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0070"/>
        <commandClass id="0072"/>
        <commandClass id="0073"/>
        <commandClass id="0075"/>
        <commandClass id="0077"/>
        <commandClass id="0085" version="2"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0060" inNIF="false" version="2"/>
      </commandClasses>
  
    <assocGroups>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="8" number="1">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Single press and hold of up/down buttons</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Одиночное нажатие или удержание клавиш вверх/вниз</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="8" number="2">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Double press and press-hold of up/down buttons</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Двойное нажатие или нажатие-удержание клавиш вверх/вниз</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="8" number="3">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Send Reports on switch state change</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Отправлять отчёты при изменение состояния нагрузки</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
      </assocGroups>
  
    <configParams>
        <configParam default="03" number="1" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">LED mode</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Режим световой индикации</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Set LED indication mode</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Режим работы светодиода</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disabled</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Отключен</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Show switch state</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Индикация состояния реле</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Night mode (inverted switch state)</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Ночной режим (противоположно состоянию реле)</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="03" to="03">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Operated by Indicator Command Class</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Управляется классом комманд Indicator</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="0000" number="2" size="2" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Automatically switch off after</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Авто отключение через</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">If not zero, automatically switch off after a user defined time</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Если не 0, автоматически отключает реле после определённого пользователем времени</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="0000" to="0000">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disabled</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Отключено</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="0001" to="ffff">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">sec</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">секунд</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="3" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">What to do on RF off command</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Что делать при получении радиокоманды выключения</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Defines how to interpret RF Off command. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Off function: Ignore - to switch on the light by motion detectors and switch it off after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to switch the light off that would break logics; Switch on - to switch on the light on both On and Off paddle press on the remote and switch it off after some amount of time. Button off click will still work (if button operations are not disabled).</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Определяет поведение при получении радио команды выключения. Может использоваться совместно с функцией авто отключения: Игнорирование - для включения света по детектору движения и отключения по прошествии определённого времени: в случае использования нескольких детекторов движения каждый будет пытаться выключить свет сам, что приведёт к неправильной логике работы; Включть нагрузку - для включения света при нажатии на кнопки Вкл и Выкл на пульте управления и отключения по прошествии определённого времени. Выключение по кнопке будет продолжать работать (если не отключено).</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch off</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Выключить нарузку</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Ignore</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Игнорировать</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch on</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Включить нарузку</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="4" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Switch on dimming by buttons</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Переключать при диммировании кнопками</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Defines if the switch should change it state to on/off if it is dimmed by buttons</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Определяет включаться/выключаться ли при диммировании кнопками</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">No</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Нет</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Yes</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Да</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="5" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Restore switch state after power cycle</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Восстанавливать состояние реле после отключения питания</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Defines if the switch should restore switch state to the last state prior to device power off (power cycle).</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Определяет восстанавливать ли состояние реле на то, которое было до отключения питания устройства.</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">No</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Нет</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Yes</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Да</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="32" number="10" size="1" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Typical click timeout</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Характерное время нажатия</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Typical time used to differenciate click, hold, double and triple clicks</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Харакерное время для отличия нажатия, удержания, двойного и тройного нажатий</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="01" to="64">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">in 10ms units</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">в единицах 10мс</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="11" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Invert buttons</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Инвертировать кнопки</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en"/>
                <lang xml:lang="ru"/>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">No</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Нет</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Yes</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Да</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="12" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Switch by buttons</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Включать/выключать нагрузку кнопками</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">If disabled, the local operations by buttons will not switch the load, but only send commands to On/Off association group. In this mode buttons are not linked with the switch anymore. They can be used separately: buttons to control remote device, switch will operate by RF commands only.</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Если отключено, нажатия на кнопки не будут включать реле, а только отправлят команды группе ассоциаций Включит/Выключить. В данном режиме кнопки не связаны с реле. Они могут быть использованы отдельно: кнопки для управления удалённой нагрузкой, реле будет управляться только по радио.</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">No</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Нет</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">By single press and hold</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Одинарным нажатием и удержанием</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">By double press and press-hold</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Двойным нажатием и нажатием-удержанием</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="13" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Action on button single press or hold</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Действия при одинарном нажатии или удержании клавиши</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Defines which command should be sent on button single press or hold. Basic and Scene Activation commands are sent to Association group. Use Scene Controller Conf to set up Scene ID for Scene Activation. Switch All commands are sent broadcast.</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Определяет вид команд, которые отправляюся при одинарном нажатии или удержании кнопок. Команды Basic и Активация сцен отправляются группе ассоциаций. Используйте Scene Controller Conf для задания номера сцены для Scene Activation. Команда Включить/Выключить всё отправляется на широковещательный адрес (всем).</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disabled</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Отключено</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Включение, выключение и диммирование с помощью Basic Set</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch All</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Включить/выключить всё</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="14" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Action on button double press or hold</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Действия при двойном нажатии или удержании клавиши</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Defines which command should be sent on button double press or press-hold. Basic and Scene Activation commands are sent to Association group. Use Scene Controller Conf to set up Scene ID for Scene Activation. Switch All commands are sent broadcast. If not disabled, the device will wait for a click timeout to see if the second click would be pressed. This will introduce a small delay for single click commands</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Определяет вид команд, которые отправляются при двойном нажатии или нажатии-удержании кнопок. Команды Basic и Активация сцен отправляются группе ассоциаций. Используйте Scene Controller Conf для задания номера сцены для Scene Activation. Команда Включить/Выключить всё отправляется на широковещательный адрес (всем). Если не отключено, устройство будет ждать характерное время нажатия второго нажатия. Данная функция приведёт к небольшой задержке при одинарном нажатии</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disabled (don't wait for double click)</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Отключено (не ждать двойного нажатия)</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Включение, выключение и диммирование с помощью Basic Set</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch All</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Включить/выключить всё</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="15" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Send the following Switch All commands</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Отправлять следующие команды включить/выключит всё</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en"/>
                <lang xml:lang="ru"/>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch off only</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Только выключить всё</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch on only</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Только включить всё</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="ff" to="ff">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch all on and off</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Включить и выключить всё</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
      </configParams>
  
    
  
    <resourceLinks>
     
    <deviceImage url="http://www.pepper1.net/zwavedb/uploads/resources/5d084abc473c8461e158d4e82b0cda817d67054b.gif"/>
          </resourceLinks>
    
  </ZWaveDevice>

                <description>Operated by Indicator Command Class</description>

              </value>

              </value>
                </configParam>

                  <description>Defines how to interpret RF Off command. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Off function: Ignore - to switch on the light by motion detectors and switch it off after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to switch the light off that would break logics; Switch on - to switch on the light on both On and Off paddle press on the remote and switch it off after some amount of time.         <configParam default="01" number="4" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Switch on dimming by buttons</name>
                  <description>Defines if the switch should change it state to on/off if it is dimmed by buttons</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>No</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Yes</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="5" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Restore switch state after power cycle</name>
                  <description>Defines if the switch should restore switch state to the last state prior to device power off (power cycle).</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>No</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Yes</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="32" number="10" size="1" type="range">
            <name>Typical click timeout</name>
                  <description>Typical time used to differenciate click, hold, double and triple clicks</description>
      
                  <value from="01" to="64">
                <description>in 10ms units</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="11" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Invert buttons</name>
                  <description></description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>No</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Yes</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="12" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Switch by buttons</name>
                  <description>If disabled, the local operations by buttons will not switch the load, but only send commands to On/Off association group. In this mode buttons are not linked with the switch anymore. They can be used separately: buttons to control remote device, switch will operate by RF commands only.</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>No</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>By single press and hold</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>By double press and press-hold</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="13" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Action on button single press or hold</name>
                  <description>Defines which command should be sent on button single press or hold. Basic and Scene Activation commands are sent to Association group. Use Scene Controller Conf to set up Scene ID for Scene Activation. Switch All commands are sent broadcast.</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Disabled</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Switch All</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="14" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Action on button double press or hold</name>
                  <description>Defines which command should be sent on button double press or press-hold. Basic and Scene Activation commands are sent to Association group. Use Scene Controller Conf to set up Scene ID for Scene Activation. Switch All commands are sent broadcast. If not disabled, the device will wait for a click timeout to see if the second click would be pressed. This will introduce a small delay for single click commands</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Disabled (don't wait for double click)</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Switch All</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="15" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Send the following Switch All commands</name>
                  <description></description>
      
                  <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Switch off only</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Switch on only</description>
              </value>
            <value from="ff" to="ff">
                <description>Switch all on and off</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
      </configParams>
  
    
  
    <resourceLinks>
     
    <deviceImage url="http://www.pepper1.net/zwavedb/uploads/resources/5d084abc473c8461e158d4e82b0cda817d67054b.gif"/>
          </resourceLinks>
    
  </ZWaveDevice>

ZDDXML.value:
<ZWaveDevice schemaVersion="2" xmlns="http://www.pepper1.net/zwavedb/xml-schemata/z-wave">

  <descriptorVersion>1</descriptorVersion>

  <deviceData>
            <manufacturerId value="0060"/>
        <productType value="0004"/>
    <productId value="0002"/>
    <libType value="06"/>
    <protoVersion value="02"/>
    <protoSubVersion value="40"/>
    <appVersion value="01"/>
    <appSubVersion value="01"/>
        <basicClass value="04"/>
            <genericClass value="10"/>
            <specificClass value="01"/>
        <optional value="true"/>
    <listening value="true"/>
    <routing value="false"/>
        <beamSensor>0</beamSensor>
                    
      </deviceData>

  <deviceDescription>
                <description>
            <lang xml:lang="de">Schalter Zwischenstecker mit Meterfunnktion</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Switch Meter Plugin</lang>
          </description>
            <wakeupNote>
            <lang xml:lang="de"/>
            <lang xml:lang="en"/>
          </wakeupNote>
            <inclusionNote>
            <lang xml:lang="de">Einfacher Tastendruck</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Single Press button</lang>
          </inclusionNote>
            <productName>AN158</productName>
            <brandName>Everspring</brandName>
            <productLine>Plugins</productLine>
                            </deviceDescription>

    <commandClasses>
        <commandClass id="0020"/>
        <commandClass id="0085" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0086"/>
        <commandClass id="0027"/>
        <commandClass id="0072"/>
        <commandClass id="0070"/>
        <commandClass id="0032" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0025"/>
      </commandClasses>
  
    <assocGroups>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="4" number="2">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Tastendruck, um andere Geräte zu schalten</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Pressing button to switch other devices</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="1" number="1">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Sende Alarm und andere Statusmeldungen</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Send Alarm, Switch Report and Meter Report</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
      </assocGroups>
  
    <configParams>
        <configParam default="0a" number="1" size="1" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Mindestschaltperiode</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">True Period</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Das ist die Mindestzeit, die ein Schaltzustand anhalten muss, bevor ein Funkkommando ausgesendet wird.</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">This is the time the switching status needs to remain unchanged after a change to cause the device to send out a status message</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Ausgeschaltet</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disable</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="78" unit="* 100 ms">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">10 * 100 ms  = 1 sec</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">10 * 100 ms  = 1 sec</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="2" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Sendet Basic Kommando</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Send Out Basic Command</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"> Aktivieren oder Deaktivieren des Sendens automatischer Statusnachrichten</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Enable or Disable the status message function when the local button press changes the switching state</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Deaktiviert</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disable</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Aktiviert</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Enable</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="0003" number="3" size="2" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Interval zum automatischen Senden des Stromreports</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Meter Report Period</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Es wird der Interval eingestellt, innerhalb dessen automatisch Leistungsdaten an Gruppe 2 gesendet werden. Der Wert 0 deaktiviert das automatische Senden.</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">The device will report its meter value within the interval set. Set to 0 will disable the autoreporting function.</lang>

    <routing value="false"/>
        <beamSensor>0</beamSensor>
                    
      </deviceData>

  <deviceDescription>
                <description>
            <lang xml:lang="de">Schalter Zwischenstecker mit Meterfunnktion</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Switch Meter Plugin</lang>
          </description>
            <wakeupNote>
            <lang xml:lang="de"/>
            <lang xml:lang="en"/>
          </wakeupNote>
            <inclusionNote>
            <lang xml:lang="de">Einfacher Tastendruck</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Single Press button</lang>
          </inclusionNote>
            <productName>AN158</productName>
            <brandName>Everspring</brandName>
            <productLine>Plugins</productLine>
                            </deviceDescription>

    <commandClasses>
        <commandClass id="0020"/>
        <commandClass id="0085" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0086"/>
        <commandClass id="0027"/>
        <commandClass id="0072"/>
        <commandClass id="0070"/>
        <commandClass id="0032" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0025"/>
      </commandClasses>
  
    <assocGroups>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="4" number="2">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Tastendruck, um andere Geräte zu schalten</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Pressing button to switch other devices</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="1" number="1">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Sende Alarm und andere Statusmeldungen</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Send Alarm, Switch Report and Meter Report</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
      </assocGroups>
  
    <configParams>
        <configParam default="0a" number="1" size="1" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Mindestschaltperiode</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">True Period</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Das ist die Mindestzeit, die ein Schaltzustand anhalten muss, bevor ein Funkkommando ausgesendet wird.</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">This is the time the switching status needs to remain unchanged after a change to cause the device to send out a status message</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Ausgeschaltet</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disable</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="78" unit="* 100 ms">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">10 * 100 ms  = 1 sec</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">10 * 100 ms  = 1 sec</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="2" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Sendet Basic Kommando</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Send Out Basic Command</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"> Aktivieren oder Deaktivieren des Sendens automatischer Statusnachrichten</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Enable or Disable the status message function when the local button press changes the switching state</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Deaktiviert</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disable</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Aktiviert</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Enable</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="0003" number="3" size="2" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Interval zum automatischen Senden des Stromreports</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Meter Report Period</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Es wird der Interval eingestellt, innerhalb dessen automatisch Leistungsdaten an Gruppe 2 gesendet werden. Der Wert 0 deaktiviert das automatische Senden.</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">The device will report its meter value within the interval set. Set to 0 will disable the autoreporting function.</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="0000" to="0000">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Ausgeschaltet</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disabled</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="0001" to="0ca8" unit="* 10 s">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Period = value * 10 sec</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Interval = Wert * 10 sec</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
      </configParams>

  <deviceData>
            <manufacturerId value="0115"/>
        <productType value="1000"/>
    <productId value="0003"/>

    <protoVersion value="03"/>
    <protoSubVersion value="2a"/>
    <appVersion value="01"/>
    <appSubVersion value="08"/>
        <basicClass value="04"/>
            <genericClass value="11"/>
            <specificClass value="07"/>
        <optional value="true"/>
    <listening value="true"/>
    <routing value="true"/>
        <beamSensor>0</beamSensor>
            <rfFrequency>EU</rfFrequency>
                
      </deviceData>

  <deviceDescription>
                <description>
            <lang xml:lang="de">Jalousiesch</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">One paddle blind control</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="ru">Устройство управление жалюзи с одной кнопкой</lang>
          </description>
            <wakeupNote>
            <lang xml:lang="de"/>
            <lang xml:lang="en"/>
            <lang xml:lang="ru"/>
          </wakeupNote>
            <inclusionNote>
            <lang xml:lang="de">Dreifach auf Schaltfläche</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Button triple press</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="ru">Тройное нажатие на одну из кнопок</lang>
          </inclusionNote>
            <productName>Flush-Mountable Blind Control v1.8</productName>
            <brandName>Z-Wave.Me</brandName>
            <productLine>Düwi modification</productLine>
            <productCode>054367Z</productCode>
                        </deviceDescription>

    <commandClasses>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0020"/>
        <commandClass id="0025"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0026" version="3"/>
        <commandClass id="0086"/>
        <commandClass id="0087"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0027"/>
        <commandClass id="008e" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0070"/>
        <commandClass id="0072"/>
        <commandClass id="0075"/>
        <commandClass id="0077"/>
        <commandClass id="0085" version="2"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0060" inNIF="false" version="2"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="002b"/>
        <commandClass id="002c"/>
        <commandClass id="002d"/>
      </commandClasses>
  
    <assocGroups>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="14" number="1">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Single press and hold of up/down buttons</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Одиночное нажатие или удержание клавиш вверх/вниз</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="14" number="2">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Double press and press-hold of up/down buttons</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Двойное нажатие или нажатие-удержание клавиш вверх/вниз</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="14" number="3">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Send Reports on blind state change</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Отправлять отчёты при изменение уровня открытия</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
      </assocGroups>
  
    <configParams>
        <configParam default="03" number="1" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">LED mode</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Режим световой индикации</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Set LED indication mode</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Режим работы светодиода</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disabled</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Отключен</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Show working state</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Индикация состояния работы</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Show idle state</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Индикация состояния простоя</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="04" to="04">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Show if not closed</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Индикация незакрытой двери</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="03" to="03">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Operated by Indicator Command Class</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Управляется классом комманд Indicator</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="0000" number="2" size="2" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Automatically open or close after</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Авто открытие/закрытие через</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">If not zero, automatically open or close blind after a user defined time</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Если не 0, автоматически открывает/закрывает жалюзи после определённого пользователем времени</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="0000" to="0000">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disabled</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Отключено</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="0001" to="ffff">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">sec</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">секунд</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>

                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Defines how to interpret RF Off command. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Close function: Ignore - to open the door by motion detectors and close it back after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to open that would break logics; Open - to open on both On and Off paddle press on the remote and close after some amount of time. Button close click will still work (if button operations are not disabled). Note that Dim Down command will still begin close motion.</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Определяет поведение при получении радио команды выключения. Может использоваться совместно с функцией авто закрытия: Игнорирование - для открытия двери по детектору движения и закрытия по прошествии определённого времени: в случае использования нескольких детекторов движения каждый будет пытаться открыть дверь сам, что приведёт к неправильной логике работы; Открывать - для открытия при нажатии на кнопки Вкл и Выкл на пульте управления и закрытия по прошествии определённого времени. Закрытие по кнопке будет продолжать работать (если не отключено). Обратите внимение, что команда Димировать Вниз в любом случае будет включать закрытие.</lang>

                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Игнорировать</lang>
                  </description>

                    <lang xml:lang="en">Open</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Открыть</lang>
                  </description>

Обратите внимание, в режиме Держать включеным возвращаемые отчёты будут всегда или Закрыто или Открыто, тогда как все значения команд Basic и Multilevel Set (1-99, 255) будут работать на Открытия, кроме команды 0, которая будет Закрывать.</lang>

Это значение может отличаться от значения Времени полного закрытия из-за воздействия силы гравитации. Используется для оценки текущего положения. Обратите внимание, в режиме Держать включеным возвращаемые отчёты будут всегда или Закрыто или Открыто, тогда как все значения команд Basic и Multilevel Set (1-99, 255) будут работать на Открытия, кроме команды 0, которая будет Закрывать.</lang>

            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Action on Auto open or close function</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Действие по Авто открытию/закрытию</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en"/>
                <lang xml:lang="ru"/>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Close blinds</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Закрывать шторы</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Open blinds</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Открывать шторы</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
      </configParams>
  
    
  
    <resourceLinks>
     
    <deviceImage url="http://www.pepper1.net/zwavedb/uploads/resources/5d084abc473c8461e158d4e82b0cda817d67054b.gif"/>
          </resourceLinks>
    
  </ZWaveDevice>

ZDDXMLLang.name: ZDDXMLLang
ZDDXMLLang.value:
<?xml version="1.0" ?><ZWaveDevice schemaVersion="2" xmlns="http://www.pepper1.net/zwavedb/xml-schemata/z-wave">

  <descriptorVersion>1</descriptorVersion>

  <deviceData>
            <manufacturerId value="0115"/>
        <productType value="1000"/>
    <productId value="0003"/>
    <libType value="03"/>
    <protoVersion value="03"/>
    <protoSubVersion value="2a"/>
    <appVersion value="01"/>
    <appSubVersion value="08"/>
        <basicClass value="04"/>
            <genericClass value="11"/>
            <specificClass value="07"/>
        <optional value="true"/>
    <listening value="true"/>
    <routing value="true"/>
        <beamSensor>0</beamSensor>
            <rfFrequency>EU</rfFrequency>
                
      </deviceData>

  <deviceDescription>
                <description>One paddle blind control</description>
            <wakeupNote></wakeupNote>
            <inclusionNote>Button triple press</inclusionNote>
            <productName>Flush-Mountable Blind Control v1.8</productName>
            <brandName>Z-Wave.Me</brandName>
            <productLine>Düwi modification</productLine>
            <productCode>054367Z</productCode>
                        </deviceDescription>

    <commandClasses>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0020"/>
        <commandClass id="0025"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0026" version="3"/>
        <commandClass id="0086"/>
        <commandClass id="0087"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0027"/>
        <commandClass id="008e" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0070"/>
        <commandClass id="0072"/>
        <commandClass id="0075"/>
        <commandClass id="0077"/>
        <commandClass id="0085" version="2"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0060" inNIF="false" version="2"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="002b"/>
        <commandClass id="002c"/>
        <commandClass id="002d"/>
      </commandClasses>
  
    <assocGroups>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="14" number="1">
            <description>Single press and hold of up/down buttons</description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="14" number="2">
            <description>Double press and press-hold of up/down buttons</description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="14" number="3">
            <description>Send Reports on blind state change</description>
          </assocGroup>
      </assocGroups>
  
    <configParams>
        <configParam default="03" number="1" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>LED mode</name>
                  <description>Set LED indication mode</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Disabled</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Show working state</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Show idle state</description>
              </value>
            <value from="04" to="04">
                <description>Show if not closed</description>
              </value>
            <value from="03" to="03">
                <description>Operated by Indicator Command Class</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="0000" number="2" size="2" type="range">
            <name>Automatically open or close after</name>
                  <description>If not zero, automatically open or close blind after a user defined time</description>
      
                  <value from="0000" to="0000">
                <description>Disabled</description>
              </value>
            <value from="0001" to="ffff">
                <description>sec</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="3" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>What to do on RF close command</name>
                  <description>Defines how to interpret RF Off command. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Close function: Ignore - to open the door by motion detectors and close it back after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to open that would break logics; Open - to open on both On and Off paddle press on the remote and close after some amount of time. Button close click will still work (if button operations are not disabled). Note that Dim Down command will still begin close motion.</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Close</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Ignore</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Open</description>
              </value>
            <value from="03" to="03">
                <description>Open if closed else close</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="16" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>What to do on button Down press</name>
                  <description>Defines how to interpret button Down press. Depends on "Switch by buttons" parameter. If not Disabled this parameter will affect the action selected by the latter parameter. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Off function.</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Close</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Open if closed else close</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Open</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="3c" number="4" size="1" type="range">
            <name>Full close time</name>
                  <description>Time to go from opened to closed state. Used to estimate the current level. Note that in Permanent motion mode the reported value would a be Closed or Opened, while all Basic and Multilevel Set values (1-99, 255) would Open except 0 value that would Close.</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Keep in permanent motion</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="ff">
                <description>seconds</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="3c" number="5" size="1" type="range">
            <name>Full open time</name>
                  <description>Time to go from closed to open state. This value may differ from Full close time for some blinds due to gravity. Used to estimate the current level. Note that in Permanent motion mode the reported value would a be Closed or Opened, while all Basic and Multilevel Set values (1-99, 255) would Open except 0 value that would Close.</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Keep in permanent motion</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="ff">
                <description>seconds</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="6" size="1" type="range">
            <name>Node Id of the blocking device</name>
                  <description>Id of the device which commands would be interpreted not as Open/Close, but as block/unblock. Usefull with door opening detector: if the door is open, block the blind not to break shades while they move.</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Disabled</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="e8">
                <description>Node Id</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="7" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>On which command from blocking node to enable the protection</name>
                  <description>Defines which command from blocking device to interpret as closed door and hence, unprotected.</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>on On</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>on Off</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="8" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Stop or Revert if opposite button is pressed</name>
                  <description>Defines behaviour on open press while closing and vice versa. To allow Stop behavior when switched by remote, use Stop by Basic</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Stop (by buttons and Binary)</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Stop (by buttons, Binary and Basic)</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Revert</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="9" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Invert open and close relays</name>
                  <description>Allow exchanging open and close relays if blind control is wired to the motor incorrectly</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>No</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Yes</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="32" number="10" size="1" type="range">
            <name>Typical click timeout</name>
                  <description>Typical time used to differentiate click, hold, double and triple clicks</description>
      
                  <value from="01" to="64">
                <description>in 10ms units</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="11" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Invert buttons</name>
                  <description></description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>No</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Yes</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="12" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Switch by buttons</name>
                  <description>If disabled, the local operations by buttons will not switch the load, but only send commands to On/Off association group. In this mode buttons are not linked with the switch anymore. They can be used separately: buttons to control remote device, switch will operate by RF commands only.</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>No</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>By single press and hold</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>By double press and press-hold</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="04" number="13" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Action on button single press or hold</name>
                  <description>Defines which command should be sent on button single press or hold. Basic and Scene Activation commands are sent to Association group. Use Scene Controller Conf to set up Scene ID for Scene Activation. Switch All commands are sent broadcast.</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Disabled</description>
              </value>
            <value from="04" to="04">
                <description>Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel)</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Switch On/Off only (send Basic Set)</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Switch All</description>
              </value>
            <value from="03" to="03">
                <description>Send Scenes</description>
              </value>
            <value from="05" to="05">
                <description>Send Preconfigured Scenes</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="14" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Action on button double press or hold</name>
                  <description>Defines which command should be sent on button double press or press-hold. Basic and Scene Activation commands are sent to Association group. Use Scene Controller Conf to set up Scene ID for Scene Activation. Switch All commands are sent broadcast. If not disabled, the device will wait for a click timeout to see if the second click would be pressed. This will introduce a small delay for single click commands</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Disabled</description>
              </value>
            <value from="04" to="04">
                <description>Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel)</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Switch On/Off only (send Basic Set)</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Switch All</description>
              </value>
            <value from="03" to="03">
                <description>Send Scenes</description>
              </value>
            <value from="05" to="05">
                <description>Send Preconfigured Scenes</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="15" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Send the following Switch All commands</name>
                  <description></description>
      
                  <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Switch off only</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Switch on only</description>
              </value>
            <value from="ff" to="ff">
                <description>Switch all on and off</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="17" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Action on Auto open or close function</name>
                  <description></description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Close blinds</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Open blinds</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
      </configParams>
  
    
  
    <resourceLinks>
     
    <deviceImage url="http://www.pepper1.net/zwavedb/uploads/resources/5d084abc473c8461e158d4e82b0cda817d67054b.gif"/>
          </resourceLinks>
    
  </ZWaveDevice>
