ZDDXML.name: ZDDXML
ZDDXML.value:
<ZWaveDevice schemaVersion="2" xmlns="http://www.pepper1.net/zwavedb/xml-schemata/z-wave">

  <descriptorVersion>1</descriptorVersion>

  <deviceData>
            <manufacturerId value="0115"/>
        <productType value="1000"/>
    <productId value="0004"/>
    <libType value="02"/>
    <protoVersion value="03"/>
    <protoSubVersion value="1c"/>
    <appVersion value="01"/>
    <appSubVersion value="01"/>
        <basicClass value="01"/>
            <genericClass value="01"/>
            <specificClass value="01"/>
        <optional value="true"/>
    <listening value="false"/>
    <routing value="false"/>
        <beamSensor>0</beamSensor>
            <rfFrequency>EU</rfFrequency>
                
      </deviceData>

  <deviceDescription>
                <description>
            <lang xml:lang="de">Batteriewandschalter mit einer Schaltfläche</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">One paddle wall controller</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="ru">Настенный контроллер с одной кнопкой</lang>
          </description>
            <wakeupNote>
            <lang xml:lang="de">Dreifach auf Schaltfläche</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Button triple press</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="ru">Тройное нажатие на одну из кнопок</lang>
          </wakeupNote>
            <inclusionNote>
            <lang xml:lang="de">Drücke Include-Taste für 2 Sekunden</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Hold Include button for 2 seconds</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="ru">Удерживайте кнопку Include 2 секунды</lang>
          </inclusionNote>
            <productName>Wall Controller v1.1</productName>
            <brandName>Z-Wave.Me</brandName>
            <productLine>Düwi modification</productLine>
            <productCode>064435</productCode>
                <batteryType>AAAA</batteryType>
            <batteryCount>2</batteryCount>
            </deviceDescription>

    <commandClasses>
        <commandClass id="0080"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0020" inNIF="false"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0085" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0086"/>
        <commandClass id="008e" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0070"/>
        <commandClass id="0072"/>
        <commandClass id="0075"/>
        <commandClass id="0077"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0060" inNIF="false" version="2"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0027" inNIF="false"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0026" inNIF="false"/>
        <commandClass id="0084" version="2"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="002b" inNIF="false"/>
      </commandClasses>
  
    <assocGroups>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="10" number="1">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Einfachdruck auf die Schaltfläche und Halten der Taste</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Single press and hold of up/down buttons</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Одиночное нажатие или удержание клавиш вверх/вниз</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="10" number="2">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Doppeldruck auf die Schaltfläche und Halten der Taste</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Double press and press-hold of up/down buttons</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Двойное нажатие или нажатие-удержание клавиш вверх/вниз</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
      </assocGroups>
  
    <configParams>
        <configParam default="32" number="10" size="1" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">max. Wartezeit zum Erkennen eines Doppelklickes</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Typical click timeout</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Характерное время нажатия</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Die maximal Zeitspanne, innerhalb der nach dem ersten Klick der zweite, dritte Klick oder erfolgen muss. </lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Typical time used to differenciate click, hold, double and triple clicks</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Харакерное время для отличия нажатия, удержания, двойного и тройного нажатий</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="01" to="64">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">in 10 ms Schritten</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">in 10ms units</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">в единицах 10мс</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="11" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Invertieren der Tastenbedeutung Hoch und Runter</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Invert buttons</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Инвертировать кнопки</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en"/>
                <lang xml:lang="ru"/>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Nein</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">No</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Нет</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Ja</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Yes</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Да</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="13" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Kommando bei Einfachdruck auf die Schaltfläche oder Halten der Schaltfläche</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Action on button single press or hold</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Действия при одинарном нажатии или удержании клавиши</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Definiert, welches Kommando beim Einfachdruck der Schaltfläche gesendet werden soll. 'Basic' und 'Scene Activation' werden dan alle Geräte in der Assoziationsgruppe gesendet, das 'Switch All' Kommando wird als Broadcast gesendet. Wenn diese Option nicht deaktiviert wurde, wartet das Gerät nach jedem ersten Tastendruck etwas, um den Einzeldruck vom Doppeldruck unterscheiden zu können. Die Szenenkommandos haben folgende Bedeutung: Nach oben = 1, nach Unten = 2, Hoch-Dimmen = 3, Herunter-Dimmen =4, Hoch-Dimmen Stop = 5, Herunter-Dimmen Stop = 6</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Defines which command should be sent on button single press or hold. Basic and Scene commands are sent to Association group. Switch All commands are sent broadcast. Scenes have following meaning: Up = 1, Down = 2, Dim Up = 3, Dim Down = 4, Dim Up Stop = 5, Dim Down Stop = 6.</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Определяет вид команд, которые отправляюся при одинарном нажатии или удержании кнопок. Команды Basic и Сцены отправляются группе ассоциаций. Команда Включить/Выключить всё отправляется на широковещательный адрес (всем). Сцены имеют следующее значение: Вверх = 1, Вниз = 2, Димминг Вверх = 3, Димминг вниз = 4, Окончание диминга вверх = 5, Окончание димминга вниз = 6.</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Deaktiviert</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disabled</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Отключено</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Schaltkommandos Ein und Aus mittels 'Basic' Kommando</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Включение, выключение и диммирование с помощью Basic Set</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">'Switch All" Kommando</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch All</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Включить/выключить всё</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="03" to="03">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Szenenaktivierung</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Scenes</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Сцены</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="14" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Kommando bei Doppeldruck auf die Schaltfläche oder Halten der Schaltfläche</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Action on button double press or hold</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Действия при двойном нажатии или удержании клавиши</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Definiert, welches Kommando beim Doppeldruck der Schaltfläche gesendet werden soll. 'Basic' und 'Scene Activation' werden dan alle Geräte in der Assoziationsgruppe gesendet, das 'Switch All' Kommando wird als Broadcast gesendet. Wenn diese Option nicht deaktiviert wurde, wartet das Gerät nach jedem ersten Tastendruck etwas, um den Einzeldruck vom Doppeldruck unterscheiden zu können. Die Szenenkommandos haben folgende Bedeutung: Nach oben = 11, nach Unten = 12, Hoch-Dimmen = 13, Herunter-Dimmen =14, Hoch-Dimmen Stop = 15, Herunter-Dimmen Stop = 16</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Defines which command should be sent on button double press or press-hold. Basic and Scene commands are sent to Association group. Switch All commands are sent broadcast. If not disabled, the device will wait for a click timeout to see if the second click would be pressed. This will introduce a small delay for single click commands. Scenes have following meaning: Up = 11, Down = 12, Dim Up = 13, Dim Down = 14, Dim Up Stop = 15, Dim Down Stop = 16.</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Определяет вид команд, которые отправляются при двойном нажатии или нажатии-удержании кнопок. Команды Basic и Сцены отправляются группе ассоциаций. Команда Включить/Выключить всё отправляется на широковещательный адрес (всем). Если не отключено, устройство будет ждать характерное время нажатия второго нажатия. Данная функция приведёт к небольшой задержке при одинарном нажатии. Сцены имеют следующее значение: Вверх = 11, Вниз = 12, Димминг Вверх = 13, Димминг вниз = 14, Окончание диминга вверх = 15, Окончание димминга вниз = 16.</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Deaktiviert (kein Warten auf Doppelcick)</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disabled (don't wait for double click)</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Отключено (не ждать двойного нажатия)</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Schaltkommandos Ein und Aus mittels 'Basic' Kommando</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Включение, выключение и диммирование с помощью Basic Set</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">'Switch All" Kommando</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch All</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Включить/выключить всё</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="03" to="03">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Szenenaktivierung</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Scenes</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Сцены</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="15" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Sende die folgenden 'Switch All' Kommandos</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Send the following Switch All commands</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Отправлять следующие команды включить/выключит всё</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en"/>
                <lang xml:lang="ru"/>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Nur Ausschalten</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch off only</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Только выключить всё</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Nur Einschalten</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch on only</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Только включить всё</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="ff" to="ff">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Einschalten und Ausschalten</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Switch all on and off</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Включить и выключить всё</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="20" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Sende beim Aufwecken unaufgefordert eine Batterie-Statusmeldung</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Send unsolicited Battery Report on Wake Up</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Отправлять непрошенные отчёт заряда батареек Battery Report при пробуждении</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de"/>
                <lang xml:lang="en"/>
                <lang xml:lang="ru"/>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Nein</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">No</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Нет</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">An das gleiche Gerät wie die Aufweck-Meldung</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">To same node as wake up notification</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Тому же узлу, что и оповещение от пробуждении</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Broadcast an alle Nachbarn</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Broadcast to neighbours</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="ru">Широковещательная рассылка соседним узлам</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
      </configParams>
  
    
  
    <resourceLinks>
     
    <deviceImage url="http://pepper1.net/zwavedb/uploads/resources/1a923f0826fc52cd7f5fe16206c7ab554f6275b0.jpg"/>
            <resourceLink url="http://www.z-wave.me/docs/ZME_064435_UserManual.pdf">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Benutzerhandbuch</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">User manual</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="ru">Руководство пользователя (на английском)</lang>
              </description>
          </resourceLink>
      </resourceLinks>
    
  </ZWaveDevice>

ZDDXMLLang.value:
<?xml version="1.0" ?><ZWaveDevice schemaVersion="2" xmlns="http://www.pepper1.net/zwavedb/xml-schemata/z-wave">

  <descriptorVersion>1</descriptorVersion>

  <deviceData>
            <manufacturerId value="0115"/>
        <productType value="1000"/>
    <productId value="0004"/>
    <libType value="02"/>
    <protoVersion value="03"/>
    <protoSubVersion value="1c"/>
    <appVersion value="01"/>
    <appSubVersion value="01"/>
        <basicClass value="01"/>
            <genericClass value="01"/>
            <specificClass value="01"/>
        <optional value="true"/>
    <listening value="false"/>
    <routing value="false"/>
        <beamSensor>0</beamSensor>
            <rfFrequency>EU</rfFrequency>
                
      </deviceData>

  <deviceDescription>
                <description>One paddle wall controller</description>
            <wakeupNote>Button triple press</wakeupNote>
            <inclusionNote>Hold Include button for 2 seconds</inclusionNote>
            <productName>Wall Controller v1.1</productName>
            <brandName>Z-Wave.Me</brandName>
            <productLine>Düwi modification</productLine>
            <productCode>064435</productCode>
                <batteryType>AAAA</batteryType>
            <batteryCount>2</batteryCount>
            </deviceDescription>

    <commandClasses>
        <commandClass id="0080"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0020" inNIF="false"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0085" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0086"/>
        <commandClass id="008e" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0070"/>
        <commandClass id="0072"/>
        <commandClass id="0075"/>
        <commandClass id="0077"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0060" inNIF="false" version="2"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0027" inNIF="false"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0026" inNIF="false"/>
        <commandClass id="0084" version="2"/>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="002b" inNIF="false"/>
      </commandClasses>
  
    <assocGroups>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="10" number="1">
            <description>Single press and hold of up/down buttons</description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="10" number="2">
            <description>Double press and press-hold of up/down buttons</description>
          </assocGroup>
      </assocGroups>
  
    <configParams>
        <configParam default="32" number="10" size="1" type="range">
            <name>Typical click timeout</name>
                  <description>Typical time used to differenciate click, hold, double and triple clicks</description>
      
                  <value from="01" to="64">
                <description>in 10ms units</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="11" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Invert buttons</name>
                  <description></description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>No</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Yes</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="13" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Action on button single press or hold</name>
                  <description>Defines which command should be sent on button single press or hold. Basic and Scene commands are sent to Association group. Switch All commands are sent broadcast. Scenes have following meaning: Up = 1, Down = 2, Dim Up = 3, Dim Down = 4, Dim Up Stop = 5, Dim Down Stop = 6.</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Disabled</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Switch All</description>
              </value>
            <value from="03" to="03">
                <description>Scenes</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="14" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Action on button double press or hold</name>
                  <description>Defines which command should be sent on button double press or press-hold. Basic and Scene commands are sent to Association group. Switch All commands are sent broadcast. If not disabled, the device will wait for a click timeout to see if the second click would be pressed. This will introduce a small delay for single click commands. Scenes have following meaning: Up = 11, Down = 12, Dim Up = 13, Dim Down = 14, Dim Up Stop = 15, Dim Down Stop = 16.</description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>Disabled (don't wait for double click)</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Switch All</description>
              </value>
            <value from="03" to="03">
                <description>Scenes</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="15" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Send the following Switch All commands</name>
                  <description></description>
      
                  <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>Switch off only</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Switch on only</description>
              </value>
            <value from="ff" to="ff">
                <description>Switch all on and off</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="20" size="1" type="rangemapped">
            <name>Send unsolicited Battery Report on Wake Up</name>
                  <description></description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>No</description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>To same node as wake up notification</description>
              </value>
            <value from="02" to="02">
                <description>Broadcast to neighbours</description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
      </configParams>
  
    
  
    <resourceLinks>
     
    <deviceImage url="http://pepper1.net/zwavedb/uploads/resources/1a923f0826fc52cd7f5fe16206c7ab554f6275b0.jpg"/>
            <resourceLink url="http://www.z-wave.me/docs/ZME_064435_UserManual.pdf">
            <description>User manual</description>
          </resourceLink>
      </resourceLinks>
    
  </ZWaveDevice>

ZDDXML.name: ZDDXML
ZDDXML.value:
<ZWaveDevice schemaVersion="2" xmlns="http://www.pepper1.net/zwavedb/xml-schemata/z-wave">

  <descriptorVersion>1</descriptorVersion>

  <deviceData>
            <manufacturerId value="0060"/>
        <productType value="0001"/>
    <productId value="0002"/>
    <libType value="06"/>
    <protoVersion value="02"/>
    <protoSubVersion value="40"/>
    <appVersion value="01"/>
    <appSubVersion value="02"/>
        <basicClass value="04"/>
            <genericClass value="20"/>
            <specificClass value="01"/>
        <optional value="true"/>
    <listening value="false"/>
    <routing value="true"/>
        <beamSensor>0</beamSensor>
                    
      </deviceData>

  <deviceDescription>
                <description>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Motion Detector with Light Detection</lang>
          </description>
            <wakeupNote>
            <lang xml:lang="en">3 times tamper switch</lang>
          </wakeupNote>
            <inclusionNote>
            <lang xml:lang="en">3 times tamper switch</lang>
          </inclusionNote>
            <productName>SP814</productName>
            <brandName>Everspring Motion Detector</brandName>
                <productCode>SP814</productCode>
                <batteryType>AA</batteryType>
            <batteryCount>3</batteryCount>
            </deviceDescription>

    <commandClasses>
        <commandClass id="0020"/>
        <commandClass id="0080"/>
        <commandClass id="0084" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0085" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0086"/>
        <commandClass id="0030"/>
        <commandClass id="0070"/>
        <commandClass id="0072"/>
      </commandClasses>
  
    <assocGroups>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="3" number="2">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Alarm switches devices with BASIC command</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="1" number="1">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Target for Alarms</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
      </assocGroups>
  
    <configParams>
        <configParam default="63" number="1" size="1" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Basic Level Set</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en">This value is added to the BASIC command</lang>
              </description>
      
          </configParam>
        <configParam default="00" number="2" size="1" type="constant">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Enable/Disable Sensor Detection Function</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en">this parameter allows to turn off the sensor function for test and debugging purposes</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">off</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="01">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">on</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="06" number="3" size="1" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Sensitivity Level</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Adjusts the sensitivity of the PIR (1 = lowest, 10 = highest</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="01" to="0a">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">level</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="0005" number="4" size="2" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Re-Trigger Interval</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en">adjusts the time when a re-trigger is allowed after triggering</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="0005" to="0e10" unit="s">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">duration</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="0a" number="5" size="1" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Lux Lexel</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en">defines the lux level in percantage when the light sensor will be activated</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="01" to="64" unit="%">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">level</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="0005" number="6" size="2" type="constant">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="en">On/Off Duration</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en">defines how long a connected light will stay turned on after triggering</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="0005" to="0e10" unit="s">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">duration</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
      </configParams>
  
    
    <alarmMappings>
        <alarmMapping alarmEventV2="01" alarmLevelV1="01" alarmTypeV1="02" alarmTypeV2="08"/>
        <alarmMapping alarmEventV2="ef" alarmLevelV1="ff" alarmTypeV1="01" alarmTypeV2="00"/>
      </alarmMappings>
  
    
  </ZWaveDevice>

  <deviceDescription>
                <description>
            <lang xml:lang="en">WWA-02 Wireless Water & Temperature Alarm - US</lang>
          </description>
            <wakeupNote>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Tap the button at the back side</lang>
          </wakeupNote>
            <inclusionNote>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Tap the button at the back side</lang>
          </inclusionNote>
            <productName>WWA-02 Wireless Water & Temperature Alarm - US</productName>
            <brandName>Fortrezz</brandName>
            <productLine>Sensors</productLine>
            <productCode>WWA-02</productCode>
            <productVersion>US</productVersion>
            <batteryType>CR2</batteryType>
            <batteryCount>1</batteryCount>
            </deviceDescription>

    <commandClasses>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0020" inNIF="false"/>

        <commandClass id="0084" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0085"/>
        <commandClass id="0086"/>
        <commandClass id="0031"/>
        <commandClass id="0070"/>
        <commandClass id="0071" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0072"/>
      </commandClasses>
  
    <assocGroups>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="5" number="3">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en">A Basic Set Command is sent to the associated nodes, if any, assigned to Group3 to indicate that a Temperature Alarm (over or under temperature) is active. When the temperature alarm is cleared due to temperature change, one additional report with value = 0x00 is sent. </lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="5" number="2">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en">A Basic Set Command with value = 0xFF is sent to the associated nodes, if any, assigned to Group2 to indicate that a Water Alarm is active. When the water alarm is cleared by drying the contacts, one additional report with value = 0x00 is sent. </lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="5" number="1">
            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en">A Basic Set Command is sent to the associated nodes, if any, assigned to Group1 to indicate that a Water Alarm OR Heat Alarm (under or over temperature) is active.</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
      </assocGroups>
  
    <configParams>
        <configParam default="04" number="1" size="1" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Low Temperature Trigger Point</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en"/>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="f6" to="7f" unit="degrees">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="en"/>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="46" number="2" size="1" type="range">

                <lang xml:lang="en">High Temperature Trigger Point</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en"/>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="80" to="46" unit="degrees">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="en"/>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
      </configParams>

            <description>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Manual</lang>
              </description>
          </resourceLink>
      </resourceLinks>
    
  </ZWaveDevice>

            <certId>14128</certId>
            <certNumber>ZC08-11030007</certNumber>

  <deviceDescription>
                <description>WWA-02 Wireless Water & Temperature Alarm - US</description>
            <wakeupNote>Tap the button at the back side</wakeupNote>
            <inclusionNote>Tap the button at the back side</inclusionNote>
            <productName>WWA-02 Wireless Water & Temperature Alarm - US</productName>
            <brandName>Fortrezz</brandName>
            <productLine>Sensors</productLine>
            <productCode>WWA-02</productCode>
            <productVersion>US</productVersion>
            <batteryType>CR2</batteryType>
            <batteryCount>1</batteryCount>
            </deviceDescription>

    <commandClasses>
        <commandClass controlled="true" id="0020" inNIF="false"/>
        <commandClass id="0080"/>
        <commandClass id="0084" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0085"/>
        <commandClass id="0086"/>
        <commandClass id="0031"/>
        <commandClass id="0070"/>
        <commandClass id="0071" version="2"/>
        <commandClass id="0072"/>
      </commandClasses>
  
    <assocGroups>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="5" number="3">
            <description>A Basic Set Command is sent to the associated nodes, if any, assigned to Group3 to indicate that a Temperature Alarm (over or under temperature) is active. When the temperature alarm is cleared due to temperature change, one additional report with value = 0x00 is sent.</description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="5" number="2">
            <description>A Basic Set Command with value = 0xFF is sent to the associated nodes, if any, assigned to Group2 to indicate that a Water Alarm is active. When the water alarm is cleared by drying the contacts, one additional report with value = 0x00 is sent.</description>
          </assocGroup>
        <assocGroup maxNodes="5" number="1">
            <description>A Basic Set Command is sent to the associated nodes, if any, assigned to Group1 to indicate that a Water Alarm OR Heat Alarm (under or over temperature) is active.</description>
          </assocGroup>
      </assocGroups>

        <configParam default="46" number="2" size="1" type="range">

                  <description></description>

                <description></description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
      </configParams>

            <lang xml:lang="de">Ist 10 min nach Includieren wach, danach Dreifachclick auf Einbruchschutzschalter</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Stays awake for 10 min. after inclusion, click on tampering switch</lang>
          </wakeupNote>
            <inclusionNote>
            <lang xml:lang="de">Einbruchschutzschalter</lang>
            <lang xml:lang="en">Tampering switch</lang>
          </inclusionNote>

                        <batteryType>AA</batteryType>

        <commandClass id="0072"/>

                <lang xml:lang="en">Triggered</lang>
              </description>
          </assocGroup>
      </assocGroups>

            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Phasenlage des Schaltkommandos</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Phase Level for ON Command</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Definiert das Kommando, das beim Ausloesen des Sensors an ein assoziiertes Gerät gesendet wird</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Defines which command to send when sensor triggers</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Ausschalten</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Set Off</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="60">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Einschalten</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Set On</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="61" to="ef">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Einschalten auf den letzten Dimmerwert</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Set On to the last Dimmer phase</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
        <configParam default="01" number="2" size="1" type="range">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="de">Stay awake</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Unterdrücke Schlaf-Funktion</lang>
              </name>

                <lang xml:lang="de">Für Testzwecke kann die Schlaf-Funktion deaktivert werden</lang>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Enables/Disables sleeping for debug purposes</lang>
              </description>
      
                  <value from="00" to="00">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Ausschalten</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Disabled</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
            <value from="01" to="ff">
                <description>
                    <lang xml:lang="de">Einschalten</lang>
                    <lang xml:lang="en">Enabled</lang>
                  </description>
              </value>
                </configParam>
      </configParams>

          </configParam>
        <configParam number="3" type="range" size="1" default="0a">
            <name>
                <lang xml:lang="en">Delta T</lang>
              </name>
                  <description>
